KBRN, Singaraja : Badan Pengawas Pemilu (Bawaslu) Kabupaten Buleleng menggelar evaluasi pelaksanaan Pemilu sebagai upaya untuk tetap menjalin kemitraan dalam pengawasan pemilu. Kegiatan bertajuk fasilitasi dan koordinasi dengan mitra kerja pada Bawaslu Kabupaten Buleleng digelar Rabu (6/11/2019) di Hotel Banyualit Lovina Desa Kalibukbuk Kecamatan Buleleng dengan menghadirkan stakeholder terkait didalam pengawasan Pemilu 2019.
Ketua Bawaslu Kabupaten Buleleng Putu Sugi Ardana usai pelaksanaan kegiatan mengungkapkan, kegiatan dilakukan sebagai rangkaian akhir pengawasan dalam pelaksanaan Pemilu 2019, dimana dalam kegiatan tersebut stakeholder yang dilibatkan diantaranya Polres Buleleng, Kodim 1609 Buleleng, Kejaksaan, desa adat, jurnalis, pramuka dan sejumlah tokoh pemuda untuk melakukan evaluasi dan menggali masukan untuk proses kegiatan serupa di tahun mendatang.
“Walaupun kita sudah selesai melaksanakan kegiatan pengawasan oleh Bawaslu, tetapi kita perlu mendapatkan masukan, kritik dan saran dari mitra kerja yang selama ini kita secara bersama-sama,” ucapnya.
Dari masukan seluruh peserta dalam kegiatan fasilitasi dan koordinasi didapatkan sejumlah masukan berkaitan dalam pengawasan pemilu, bahkan diharapkan sejumlah masukan yang disampaikan para peserta dapat diterapkan untuk pengawasan pelaksanaan Pilkada maupun Pemilu. Pada sisi lain, peserta juga berharap Bawaslu Buleleng mampu melibatkan berbagai komponen masyarakat didalam melakukan pengawasan termasuk menyampaikan sejumlah usulan dan saran yang berkaitan dengan proses pendataan pemilih, penetapan daftar pemilih hingga pelaksanaan kampanye dan pencoblosan.

KBRN, Singaraja: The Election Supervisory Body (Bawaslu) of the Regency of Buleleng held an evaluation of the implementation of the elections in an effort to continue to forge partnerships in election oversight. The activity titled facilitation and coordination with partners in the Buleleng Regency Bawaslu was held Wednesday (11/06/2019) at the Banyualit Lovina Hotel, Kalibukbuk Village, Buleleng District by presenting relevant stakeholders in the 2019 Election supervision.
Head of Bawaslu of Buleleng Regency Putu Sugi Ardana after the implementation of the activities revealed, the activity was carried out as a final series of supervision in the implementation of the 2019 Election, where in the activity stakeholders involved included Buleleng Regional Police, Bulim 1609 Kodim, Attorney General, customary villages, journalists, scouts and a number of youth leaders. to conduct evaluations and gather input for similar activities in the coming year.
"Even though we have finished carrying out surveillance activities by Bawaslu, but we need to get input, criticism and suggestions from our working partners who have been together," he said.
From the input of all participants in the facilitation and coordination activities, a number of inputs related to election supervision were obtained, and it was hoped that some of the inputs submitted by the participants could be applied to oversee the implementation of the elections and the election. On the other hand, participants also hoped that Bawaslu Buleleng was able to involve various components of the community in conducting surveillance including submitting a number of proposals and suggestions relating to the voter data collection process, determination of the voter register to the implementation of campaigns and voting.
